Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: 50% Text scale
Metadata.Note:
Smaller text, looks good on higher resolutions.
If you want to try other resolution values: 
 90%:6666663F 
80%:CDCC4C3F 
70%:3333333F 
60%:9A99193F 
50%:0000003F
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: FMOD Crash Fix
Metadata.Note: May unintentionally prevent some sound playback?
Metadata.Author: Dasaav

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Model LOD 2 (Lowest)
Metadata.Note: Lowest model detail, performance increase. Affects visuals, lower Model LOD.
Metadata.Author: Kyo, auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Model LOD 1 (Lower)
Metadata.Note: Slightly lower model detail, performance increase. Affects visuals, lower Model LOD.
Metadata.Author: Kyo, auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Model LOD -2 (Highest)
Metadata.Note: Highest model detail, performance increase. Affects visuals, Higher model LOD.
Metadata.Author: Kyo, auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Increased Graphics Heap Sizes
Metadata.Author: auser1337
Metadata.Note:
This patch increases the graphic heap size, 
allowing more memory to be used. 
MUST BE USED WITH INCREASED DMEM. 
keep in mind this is already in resolution patches above 1080p,
but some users requested it seperately.

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Intel 12th Gen+ SFX workaround
Metadata.Note: Disables part of SFX related code to workaround crash on Windows with newer Intel chips (SFX folder can be used with patch)
Metadata.Author: emoose

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Better 30 FPS [READ NOTES]
Metadata.Note: Changes some frame settings like the frame skip, vsync, frame tearing, etc.. \nWill help with better input delay/response times for 30 FPS.
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: 60 FPS (no deltatime)
Metadata.Note: 60 fps without deltatime, only downside is no deltatime. \n(1/60 frames instead of 1/30) which means if you cannot maintain 60 fps, the game will slow down a little. \nHowever, it fixes the cutscenes crashing, Long wait on cutscene when creating character, Ebrietas SFX, Poison tick, etc.)
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Uncap FPS + (Deltatime)
Metadata.Note: CAP/UNCAP FPS BY SETTING VBLANK FREQUENCY. Or something external like Nvidia control panel, rivatuner, etc.
Metadata.Author: Lance McDonald (manfightdragon), Kyo, emoose, StevenMiller123, raphaelthegreat

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Restore Debug Menu (READ NOTES)
Metadata.Author: Whitehawkx, auser1337
Metadata.Note: This patch requires debug font files, which is available from nexusmods. It will crash without them. Access the menu by pressing left side of touchpad.

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Performance Patch [READ NOTE]
Metadata.Note: Modifies some of the games debug menu parameters, automatically applying them for better performance. Some of them do not trigger until the debug menu render GUI initialization. Meaning you need the debug menu patch active, and you need to open the Rendering System GUIWidget under [Graphics > GFX > Rendering SystemGUIWidget]
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Disable vsync
Metadata.Note: This patch disables vsync to play ABOVE 60 FPS. Needs to be used with the 60 FPS patch and the Vblank Frequency set to above 60hz in the settings (it is recommended to not go over 100hz as the game's engine has some issues over 100 FPS).
Metadata.Author: illusion

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Disable Camera Auto Rotation via Movement
Metadata.Note: Disables the camera from auto rotating when you move your character around, manual camera movement and lock-on still work.
Metadata.Author: Imedved, Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Increased camera distance
Metadata.Note: Playercam further away from player.
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: No Rally Decay
Metadata.Note: Rally doesn't decay
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Player No Dead (Read note)
Metadata.Note: Can take damage but never drop below 1hp. (baby mode)
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Player Stealth (Read note)
Metadata.Note: Enemies do not see or react to you (unless attacked)
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Player Silent (Read note)
Metadata.Note: Enemies do not hear you but can still see you.
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Unlock Game Region
Metadata.Note: Unlocks the game region to support additional language options, switches the X and Circle buttons
Metadata.Author: Lance McDonald (manfightdragon)

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Enemy Control
Metadata.Note: R3 to control targeted enemy / L3 to go back
Metadata.Author: stagvant

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: 1080p Light Grid (READ NOTES)
Metadata.Note: Increases performance by lowering Light grid draw calls. USE VERSION THAT MATCHES YOUR WINDOW/FULLSCREEN RESOLUTION, NOT RENDER RESOLUTION PATCH.
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: 1440p Light Grid (READ NOTES)
Metadata.Note: Increases performance by lowering Light grid draw calls. USE VERSION THAT MATCHES YOUR WINDOW/FULLSCREEN RESOLUTION, NOT RENDER RESOLUTION PATCH.
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: 4k Light Grid (READ NOTES)
Metadata.Note: Increases performance by lowering Light grid draw calls. USE VERSION THAT MATCHES YOUR WINDOW/FULLSCREEN RESOLUTION, NOT RENDER RESOLUTION PATCH.
Metadata.Author: Kyo

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (560p)
Metadata.Note: Lowest it can go without the target HP bar being invisible.
Metadata.Author: Ashen

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (2560x1440)
Metadata.Note: Requires you to set a custom amount of additional Dmem in the game-specific settings, recommended amount is 4000.
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (3840x2160)
Metadata.Note: Requires you to set a custom amount of additional Dmem in the game-specific settings, recommended amount is in between 6000 to 8000.
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (1280x800) (16:10)
Metadata.Note: As the game wasn't made to be played at aspect ratio different than 16:9 some issues may appear (mostly UI related), a mod (called 16x10 and 4x3 UI Fixes (Steam Deck)) to workaround that issue is available on Nexusmods.
Metadata.Author: xzy

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (2560x1080) (21:9 2.37)
Metadata.Note: Requires you to set a custom amount of additional Dmem in the game-specific settings, recommended amount is 4000. As the game wasn't made to be played at aspect ratio different than 16:9 some issues may appear (mostly UI related), a mod (called Ultrawide UI Fixes) to workaround that issue is available on Nexusmods.
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (3440x1440) (21:9 2.38)
Metadata.Note: Requires you to set a custom amount of additional Dmem in the game-specific settings, recommended amount is in between 6000 to 8000. As the game wasn't made to be played at aspect ratio different than 16:9 some issues may appear (mostly UI related), a mod (called Ultrawide UI Fixes) to workaround that issue is available on Nexusmods.
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (5120x2160) (5K2K / 21:9 ~2.37)
Metadata.Note: Requires you to set a custom amount of additional Dmem in the game-specific settings, recommended amount is in between 8000 to 12000.
Metadata.Author: xzy, auser1337 and ollieatkinson

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (3840x1080) (32:9 ~3.55)
Metadata.Note: Requires you to set a custom amount of additional Dmem in the game-specific settings, recommended amount is in between 6000 to 8000. As the game wasn't made to be played at aspect ratio different than 16:9 some issues may appear (mostly UI related), a mod (called Ultrawide UI Fixes) to workaround that issue is available on Nexusmods.
Metadata.Author: xzy and auser1337

Metadata.Title: Bloodborne
Metadata.Name: Resolution Patch (1280x960) (4:3 ~1.33)
Metadata.Note: As the game wasn't made to be played at aspect ratio different than 16:9 some issues may appear (mostly UI related), a mod (called 16x10 and 4x3 UI Fixes (Steam Deck)) to workaround that issue is available on Nexusmods.
Metadata.Author: xzy
